Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Slow \Slow\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Slowed}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Slowing}.] To render slow; to slacken the speed of; to retard; to delay; as, to slow a steamer. --Shak. [1913 Webster]
slowing n : a decrease in speed; "the deceleration of the arms race" [syn: {deceleration}, {retardation}] [ant: {acceleration}]
